text.section: After each constituent entity has approved a merger, articles of merger shall be signed on behalf of each constituent entity by an authorized representative.
The limited cooperative association that is the surviving entity to a merger shall deliver the articles of merger to the Secretary of State for filing.
A merger becomes effective upon the articles of merger being effective as provided in KRS 14A.2-070.

law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 116, effective July 12, 2012.
